name: Hr Press Lite
author: CodeClove

sections.description:
Hr Press Lite is Employee management system that help companies to manage employees and employees time, holidays, leave etc. it is user friendly and easy to user wordpress plugin. You can use Hr Press Lite completely free.

It can also manage Departments, Designations, Employee Leaves, Holidays, Employee Attendance and more will be added as plugin progress.

Hr Press Lite lets you manage Employees daily timings and breaks. Hr Press Lite uses a very modern, clean and easy to use interface to make managing a breeze!

Did you know?
More than 700,000 WordPress websites were attacked during September 2020.
Malicious bots are looking to exploit vulnerable versions of WP file manager plugins.

Fortunately, Hr Press Lite is built with security in mind and comes with this vulnerability fixed! So rest assured! Hr Press Lite poses no risk to you!

‚ö°Ô∏èFeatures include:

  • Employees check-in and check-out time
  • Employees Break logs
  • Send emails to employees
  • Announcements
  • Departments
  • Designations
  • Attendance

  • Leave requests
  • Send Holiday emails to employees

  • IP Address whitelisting
  • Better support

sections.installation:
1. Unzip all files to the wp-content/plugins/hrpress-lite directory
  2. Log into WordPress admin and activate the ‘HrPress Lite’ plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu
  3. Go to Hr Press Lite > Dashboard in the left-hand menu to start using

More information on using the plugin is available here.
